dcterms:description: The provided Shopping Queries Dataset involves 3 languages: English, Japanese, and Spanish. It contains query-product pairs and relevance judgements categorized into Exact, Substitute, Complement, or Irrelevant (ESCI). The dataset includes a list of up to 40 potentially relevant product results for each query, along with associated product information such as title, description, bullet points, brand, color, and locale.
dcterms:title: Shopping Queries Dataset
